node.excerpt: Now We're Talking Yeah, now we're talking!  That's just about right  As we dive into this looped beat  You're sure to come alive Yeah, now we're talking!  We move our worries into the night  Forget that maybe thereâ€™s a tomorrow  As soon as it droppedâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Now We're Talking
frontmatter.description: It's somewhat late to try it.

node.excerpt: Need You Back I'm holding the tickets from the last day  And I shouldn't, I promised I wouldn't regret  We were stretching, nothing in the long run  But I wasn't miserable, still looking up  I'm reading the letters written back then  A list ofâ€¦

Go-To Me I'm worried about you  Have you been able to sleep okay?  You're working too hard  Try to take some time for yourself  You're keeping it inside  But you can tell me anything if you'd like  I turn to blame me  â€˜Cause maybe something I didâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Go-To Me
frontmatter.description: And I'm revolving around you like a satellite.

node.excerpt: Overwrite Tell me what you're needing  I'll try to get it for you  There's nothing that'd be too much  I want you to have it your way  You don't need to break a sweat  We can find our own pace As for me, consider me satisfied  Just let me look inâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Overwrite
frontmatter.description: Watch them overwrite my old favorite color.

node.excerpt: Worthy Rest your head over my shoulder  That's the only thing we do, anyway  They'd say we don't try it that hard  But we try not to care what they say  Dance your fingers through my hair  And it won't leave my mind all day  Make me rhyme a word withâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Worthy
frontmatter.description: I don't know what I'm waiting for.

node.excerpt: All That Takes Lately, I've been visiting places I can't afford to go  And I've been turning myself to people I think I'll never know  From the moment you were no longer a stranger  Something more upbeat has me turning up the radio  I've learnt toâ€¦

frontmatter.title: All That Takes
frontmatter.description: And then you freed me from the little things that tricked me.

messages.title: Poems With Choruses
messages.description: Documenting life as I try to fit it in the lyrics of a song.
